Debug methods¶

class scripts.managers.game_manager.debug_methods.DebugMethods(manager)[source]¶

Bases: object

Methods for taking actions with the state of the game

set_visibility(visible)[source]¶

Set whether the debug info is visible

Parameters

visible (bool) –

initialise_logging()[source]¶

Configure logging

Logging levels:

CRITICAL - A serious error, indicating that may be unable to continue running. ERROR - A more serious problem, has not been able to perform some function. WARNING - An indication that something unexpected happened, but otherwise still working as expected. INFO - Confirmation that things are working as expected. DEBUG - Detailed information, typically of interest only when diagnosing problems

File mode options:

‘r’ - open for reading(default) ‘w’ - open for writing, truncating the file first ‘x’ - open for exclusive creation, failing if the file already exists ‘a’ - open for writing, appending to the end of the file if it exists

initialise_profiling()[source]¶

Initialise and enable the profiler

disable_logging()[source]¶

Turn off current logging and clear logging resources

disable_profiling()[source]¶

Turn off current profiling

dump_profiling_data()[source]¶

Dump data to a readable file

_get_furthest_free_position(start_position, target_direction, max_distance, travel_type)[source]¶

Checks each position in a line and returns the last position that doesnt block movement. If no position in range blocks movement then the last position checked is returned. If all positions in range block movement then starting position is returned.

Parameters

  • () (max_distance) –

  • () –

  • () –
